Name: Constitution
Description: The constitution is the supreme law of a place. ItÂ defines the fundamental legal and political principles, including e.g. the rights of the people and the structure of government.

Properties.Name: Jurisdiction
Properties.Description: The jurisdiction this constitution governs. The highest level of jurisdiction only. E.g., if it is the constitution of a country, enter that country; if it is the constitution of a state or province, enter that state or province only.

Properties.Name: Unratified Amendments
Properties.Description: Proposed amendments to this constitution that have not been ratified.
